header.subtitle: Understand your health at a glance

bmi.tipsUnderweight: For a healthy weight, ensure adequate nutrition and regular exercise. Consult with your doctor.
bmi.tipsNormal: Maintain your current weight! Stay healthy with a balanced diet and regular exercise.
bmi.tipsOverweight: Weight loss is recommended for better health. Reduce calorie intake and increase exercise.
bmi.tipsObese: Consult with a doctor to develop a weight management plan. Professional guidance is essential.
